all_questions.question: What is the default size of the transformer setup?
How many parameters are in the default feedforward network?
all_questions.context: There is 8000 vector elements in the feedforward network and the default is to use 16 heads.

all_questions.question: What would be the effect of doubling the number of layers and increasing the size of the dimension of the feedforward network?
all_questions.context: So what if we increase the depth? ... So that is a deep network.

all_questions.question: How many GPUs are required to train the wide transformer setup?
all_questions.context: And you will need definitely two GPUs to train it at the same time.

all_questions.question: What is the effect of using a deep network compared to a wide network, especially on low resource languages?
all_questions.context: And as you will see, the deep setup will be better than the wide setup, especially on low resource languages.
